statements: SELECT * FROM trade_executions ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT trade_id, quantity, price FROM trade_executions WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT trade_id, timestamp, quantity, price FROM trade_executions WHERE price > 100.00 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT DISTINCT quantity FROM trade_executions WHERE price < 50.00
SELECT trade_id, timestamp FROM trade_executions WHERE quantity >= 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM trade_executions WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT trade_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM trade_executions GROUP BY trade_id HAVING total_quantity > 1000
SELECT trade_id, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM trade_executions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' GROUP BY trade_id ORDER BY avg_price DESC
SELECT trade_id, COUNT(*) AS trade_count FROM trade_executions WHERE quantity >= 100 GROUP BY trade_id ORDER BY trade_count DESC
SELECT MAX(price) AS max_price, MIN(price) AS min_price FROM trade_executions
SELECT * FROM trade_executions;
SELECT stock_symbol, quantity, price FROM trade_executions WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT trade_id, stock_symbol, execution_timestamp FROM trade_executions ORDER BY execution_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM market_activity WHERE trader_id = 12345;
SELECT activity_id, action, trader_id FROM market_activity WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT * FROM trade_executions WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY execution_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT trade_id, stock_symbol, price FROM trade_executions WHERE price < 50 AND stock_symbol LIKE 'AAP%' ORDER BY trade_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT stock_symbol, AVG(price) as avg_price FROM trade_executions GROUP BY stock_symbol HAVING AVG(price) > 100 ORDER BY avg_price DESC;
SELECT trade_id, stock_symbol, quantity, price, execution_timestamp FROM trade_executions WHERE execution_timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY quantity DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT market_activity.stock_symbol, market_activity.action, trade_executions.quantity, trade_executions.price FROM market_activity INNER JOIN trade_executions ON market_activity.stock_symbol = trade_executions.stock_symbol WHERE market_activity.activity_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY market_activity.activity_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM trade_executions;
SELECT symbol, price FROM trade_executions WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT trade_id, symbol, timestamp FROM trade_executions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM trade_history WHERE executed_quantity < 50 ORDER BY execution_timestamp ASC;
SELECT symbol, activity_type FROM market_activity WHERE activity_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM trade_executions WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT symbol, price, quantity, timestamp FROM trade_executions WHERE timestamp >= '2021-01-01' AND symbol = 'AAPL' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT symbol, MIN(price), MAX(price), AVG(quantity) FROM trade_executions GROUP BY symbol;
SELECT th.symbol, th.execution_type, te.price, te.quantity FROM trade_history th JOIN trade_executions te ON th.trade_id = te.trade_id WHERE te.quantity * te.price > 1000;
SELECT * FROM market_activity WHERE activity_type = 'Buy' ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM trades WHERE trade_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT symbol, quantity, price FROM trades WHERE quantity > 100
SELECT symbol, execution_time, execution_price FROM executions ORDER BY execution_price DESC
SELECT symbol_name, symbol_description FROM symbols WHERE symbol_id = 5
SELECT activity_id, timestamp FROM market_activity
SELECT * FROM trades WHERE trade_id = 1
SELECT symbol, price FROM trades ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT execution_time, execution_price, execution_quantity FROM executions WHERE trade_id = 2 ORDER BY execution_time ASC
SELECT symbol_name, symbol_description FROM symbols WHERE symbol_id = 3
SELECT * FROM market_activity ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM trades;
SELECT trade_id, symbol, quantity FROM trades WHERE price > 100;
SELECT name, email FROM traders ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM brokers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT market_id, name, country FROM markets ORDER BY country DESC, name ASC;
SELECT * FROM trades WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT symbol, quantity, price FROM trades WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' AND price >= 150.00;
SELECT name, email FROM traders WHERE trader_id IN (SELECT trader_id FROM executions WHERE trade_id = 5);
SELECT * FROM executions JOIN traders ON executions.trader_id = traders.trader_id JOIN brokers ON executions.broker_id = brokers.broker_id;
SELECT market_id, name, country FROM markets WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY name ASC;
